statement.p: Find the perimeter and area of the trapezoid above. Side lengths are measurements.
The bottom has length \displaystyle{9.65}; top has length \displaystyle{9.29}. The sides have lengths \displaystyle{10.25} and \displaystyle{10.21}. The height is \displaystyle{10.15}.

solution.p: The perimeter is the sum of the four sides which are given. \displaystyle{9.29}+{10.21}+{9.65}+{10.25}={39.4}.
